statements: SELECT employee_name, start_date, benefit_amount FROM EmployeeBenefits WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeBenefits WHERE benefit_type = 'Health';
SELECT employee_name, benefit_type, start_date, end_date FROM EmployeeBenefits WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT benefit_type FROM EmployeeBenefits;
SELECT employee_name, end_date, benefit_amount FROM EmployeeBenefits WHERE benefit_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeBenefits WHERE employee_id = 123;
SELECT employee_name, benefit_type, benefit_amount FROM EmployeeBenefits WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT employee_name, start_date, end_date, benefit_amount FROM EmployeeBenefits WHERE benefit_type = 'Health';
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, start_date, end_date, benefit_amount FROM EmployeeBenefits WHERE end_date > '2023-01-01' ORDER BY benefit_amount DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_benefits, AVG(benefit_amount) AS avg_amount FROM EmployeeBenefits WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM EmployeeBenefits;
SELECT employee_name, benefit_type FROM EmployeeBenefits WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT benefit_type, benefit_amount FROM EmployeeBenefits ORDER BY benefit_amount DESC;
SELECT employee_name FROM EmployeeBenefits WHERE benefit_amount > 1000 AND benefit_type = 'Health';
SELECT * FROM EmployeeBenefits WHERE employee_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM EmployeeBenefits WHERE employee_id = 1 ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT employee_name, benefit_type, benefit_amount FROM EmployeeBenefits WHERE benefit_amount > 1000 ORDER BY benefit_amount ASC;
SELECT employee_name, benefit_amount FROM EmployeeBenefits WHERE benefit_type = 'healthcare' AND benefit_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY employee_name ASC, benefit_amount DESC;
SELECT e.employee_name, b.compliance_date FROM EmployeeBenefits e INNER JOIN BenefitsCompliance b ON e.employee_id = b.employee_id WHERE b.compliance_status = TRUE ORDER BY b.compliance_date DESC;
SELECT employee_name, benefit_type, benefit_amount FROM EmployeeBenefits WHERE employee_name LIKE 'J%' OR employee_name LIKE 'M%' ORDER BY employee_name ASC, benefit_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_benefits;
SELECT employee_name, benefit_type, benefit_amount FROM employee_benefits WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, benefit_amount FROM employee_benefits WHERE benefit_type = 'Healthcare';
SELECT * FROM benefit_providers WHERE provider_id = 2;
SELECT provider_name, contact_person, contact_email FROM benefit_providers ORDER BY provider_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_benefits WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT employee_name, benefit_type FROM employee_benefits ORDER BY benefit_amount DESC;
SELECT provider_name, contact_person FROM benefit_providers WHERE provider_id BETWEEN 1 AND 3;
SELECT employee_name, benefit_amount FROM employee_benefits WHERE benefit_amount > 1000 ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT benefit_type, count(*) AS total_employees FROM employee_benefits GROUP BY benefit_type;
SELECT * FROM employees ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT employee_id, name FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT'
SELECT name, hire_date FROM employees WHERE hire_date >= '2021-01-01'
SELECT employee_id, department FROM employees WHERE department IN ('HR','Finance')
SELECT * FROM benefits WHERE coverage > 80
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT name, department FROM employees WHERE hire_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT e.name, b.name, eb.start_date, eb.end_date FROM employees e JOIN employee_benefits eb ON e.employee_id = eb.employee_id JOIN benefits b ON eb.benefit_id = b.benefit_id;

SELECT e.name AS employee_name, b.cost_amount AS benefit_cost FROM employees e JOIN employee_benefits eb ON e.employee_id = eb.employee_id JOIN benefits b ON eb.benefit_id = b.benefit_id WHERE b.cost_amount > 1000;
SELECT c.compliance_id, e.name AS employee_name, c.compliance_status FROM compliance c JOIN employees e ON c.employee_id = e.employee_id WHERE c.compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM Employees;
SELECT full_name, department, salary FROM Employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT full_name, hire_date FROM Employees ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Benefits WHERE coverage > 1000;
SELECT b.benefit_name, e.full_name FROM Benefits b JOIN Employees e ON b.employee_id = e.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM Employees WHERE department = 'Marketing';
SELECT full_name, salary FROM Employees WHERE salary > 50000 ORDER BY salary DESC;

SELECT e.full_name, b.benefit_name, bh.action_date FROM Employees e JOIN Benefits b ON e.employee_id = b.employee_id JOIN BenefitsHistory bh ON e.employee_id = bh.employee_id ORDER BY bh.action_date DESC;
SELECT e.full_name, c.compliance_type, c.compliance_status FROM Employees e LEFT JOIN Compliance c ON e.employee_id = c.employee_id WHERE c.compliance_status = 'Pending';
SELECT d.dependant_name, d.relation, e.full_name FROM Dependants d JOIN Employees e ON d.employee_id = e.employee_id WHERE e.department = 'Engineering' ORDER BY d.dob ASC;
